data_description.api_key: The API key of the SABnzbd server. This can be found in the SABnzbd web interface under Config cog (top right) > General > Security.
data_description.url: The full URL, including port, of the SABnzbd server. Example: `http://localhost:8080` or `http://a02368d7-sabnzbd:8080`, if you are using the add-on.

service_call_exception.message: Unable to send command to SABnzbd due to a connection error, try again later

pause_action_deprecated.description: The 'Pause' action is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Please use the 'Pause' button instead. To remove this issue, please adjust automations accordingly and restart Home Assistant.
pause_action_deprecated.title: SABnzbd pause action deprecated

resume_action_deprecated.description: The 'Resume' action is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Please use the 'Resume' button instead. To remove this issue, please adjust automations accordingly and restart Home Assistant.
resume_action_deprecated.title: SABnzbd resume action deprecated

set_speed_action_deprecated.description: The 'Set speed' action is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Please use the 'Speedlimit' number entity instead. To remove this issue, please adjust automations accordingly and restart Home Assistant.
set_speed_action_deprecated.title: SABnzbd set_speed action deprecated

api_key.description: The SABnzbd API key to pause downloads.
api_key.name: SABnzbd API key

api_key.description: The SABnzbd API key to resume downloads.
api_key.name: SABnzbd API key

api_key.description: The SABnzbd API key to set speed limit.
